text: Rosa I Love You is a 1990 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P Chandrakumar, starring Innocent and Abhilasha in the lead roles.http://www.nthwall.com/ml/Rosa-I-Love-You-1976/9465402383 ==Cast== * P.Sukumar (Kiran) * Innocent * Abhilasha * Poonam Dasgupta ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Rosa I Love You
